definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: This paper expounds the application of the statistical work in the management of coal transportation and marketing.
sentences.chinese: 陳述了統計工作在煤炭運銷管理中的應用。

sentences.english: Salt was usually shipped along natural trade routes.
sentences.chinese: 食鹽通常經由自然商道運銷各地。

sentences.english: Executive Director of China Coal Transportation & Sale Society, Professor Level Senior Engineer, former Deputy Chairman of China Coal Transportation & Sale Society.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國煤炭運銷協會顧問，教授級高級工程師。

sentences.english: Some suggestions concerning the super-vision and administration are offered.
sentences.chinese: 提出了抓好礦產品運銷環節的監督管理的建議。
